bike.description: Blend of high and mid modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Elite M30/T700 lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters and ACE internal cables compatible with Di2, Carbon 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, Carbon PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin SST seat stays with hidden carrier/fender eyelets, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis ECO carbon composite fork, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, alloy dropouts with hidden eyelet
FSA integrated, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Shimano R500 wheelset, 20/24H, 24mm rim profile, R500 forged aluminum loose ball hubs with bladed stainless steel spokes
Shimano 105 RD-5700 rear and 105 FD-5700 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
FSA PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG adaptors
Tektro R359 forged alloy long reach dual pivot calipers with cartridge pads and Shimano 105 ST-5700 STI brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo, gel inserts on top bar and "J" end plug
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Open with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
